phrs.translation: 发球，开球；开始；分叉，引出歧管
v. [高尔夫]置（球）于球座上；准备；安排
n. T恤；短袖圆领运动衫（等于T-shirt）

sentences.sentence: That really teed off the old boy.
sentences.translation: 那可实在激怒了那个老家伙。

sentences.sentence: I bet Bernard is really teed off with me!
sentences.translation: 我想伯纳德可真的生我气了！

sentences.sentence: Something the boy said to him teed him off.
sentences.translation: 那个男孩说的一些话把他给惹恼了。
